synopsis.p: Exports part of the layer contents in HTML.

description.p: exports the annotations in HTML. Open with a browser the index.html file created in outDir to vizualize exported annotations.

param-doc.name: tagFeature
param-doc.p: Feature containing the tag name for layout annotations.

param-doc.name: typeFeature
param-doc.p: Feature containing the type of the mention.

param-doc.name: documentTitle
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a string representing the document title.

param-doc.name: outDir
param-doc.p: Directory where to place exported files.

param-doc.name: layoutLayer
param-doc.p: Layer containing layout (HTML) annotations, like i, b or p.

param-doc.name: colors
param-doc.p: List of colors used to render mentions. This is deprecated, use colorMap instead.

param-doc.name: colorMap
param-doc.p: Map of colors used to render mentions. Keys are mention types and values are colors in CSS syntax.
